description:
While trying to save Polnareff, Avdol is struck down by the enemy`s attack. After witnessing this, Polnareff is unable to keep his cool and is in a state of shock. That is when Centerfold`s Stand, Hanged Man starts its full on attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Emperor and The Hanged Man, Part 2
皇帝[エンペラー]と吊られた男[ハングドマン] その2
